Laravel Charts

The laravel adapter for Chartisan

Get Started →

Chartisan-Powered

Powered by one of the most powerful charting libraries on the front-end.

Performant & Customizable

Chartisan does allow creating performant and customizable charts out of the box.

Specific laravel features like routing, middlewares and creation commands.
